title: Marcelo Ortiz
text:
I am an Assistant Professor of Financial Accounting at Universitat Pompeu Fabra and an Affiliated Professor at the Barcelona School of Economics and UPF-Barcelona School of Management. I also co-organize the Barcelona Accounting Summer Seminars and Workshops.
My CV is available here.
Research Interests: Corporate Governance, Financial Reporting, Financial Analysis, Business Families, and Tax avoidance.
